name: Goodra
flavorText:
This very friendly Dragon-type Pokémon
will hug its beloved Trainer, leaving
that Trainer covered in sticky slime.

previous.name: Sliggoo
previous.flavorText:
It drives away opponents by excreting a
sticky liquid that can dissolve anything.
Its eyes devolved, so it can’t see anything.

next.name: Klefki
next.flavorText:
These key collectors threaten any attackers
by fiercely jingling their keys at them.

pokemon.name: Goomy
pokemon.flavorText:
The weakest Dragon-type Pokémon,
it lives in damp, shady places, so its
body doesn’t dry out.
